p: Use of innovative and existing technologies to use face masks is one of the primary research interest in this situation. Various research is being done based on the idea of reducing, reusing and recyclability of existing masks, to ease the demand for face masks [ 127]. New technologies for affordable production methods have been applied, as local ventures can help in the production of masks. Modification of existing materials, as well as an alteration in masks designs, are made to improve the multipurpose functionality in masks. New materials and technologies for mask production or modification of existing surgical masks are reported.
